mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply(customer_id, hotel_id, title, content, entry_date, modify_date, score) VALUES (#{customerId}, #{hotelId}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW(), #{score})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reply WHERE hotel_id = #{hotelId}
SELECT SUM(score) FROM reply WHERE hotel_id = #{hotelId}
SELECT * FROM reply INNER JOIN hotel ON reply.hotel_id = hotel.id WHERE reply.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE reply SET score = #{score}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, modify_date = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
